issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Add `ExecutionContext::from<ExecutionContextState>`
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10171](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10171). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
An `ExecutionContext` can be safely created from an `ExecutionContextState` . Therefore, we can make it public (instead of the current `pub(crate)`).

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10171?focusedCommentId=17207716) by Jorge Leitão (jorgecarleitao):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8335
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8335>
